subject: Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Guard Brandon Knight, headed to Kentucky in the fall, and power forward Chiney Ogwumike, a Stanford recruit, have been honored as national high school athletes of the year.
snippet: Guard Brandon Knight, headed to Kentucky in the fall, and power forward Chiney Ogwumike, a Stanford recruit, have been honored as national high school athletes of the year.
